name: Sigma Theory: Global Cold War
description: A Turn-based Strategy game in a futuristic global cold war from the award-winning creators of Out There. Recruit a squad of special agents and run your intel agency to secure the control of the singularity.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: 1,3 GHz CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GT 440 or AMD Radeon HD 5550 w/ 512 MB Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7 Processor: Dual-core 2Ghz CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX® 10 compliant graphics card Storage: 1 GB available space
